overview:
David Appelbaum is a leader who knows how to knife-fight while running a highly professional marketing operation. He brings over 17 years of experience in disruptive marketing at some of the most innovative software technology companies in the world.

Prior to Act On, David led marketing for BigFix, where his cutting-edge use of social media and guerilla campaigns were widely recognized in the industry. During his tenure, BigFix grew at an annual 40% year over year rate before being acquired by IBM for $400m in 2010.

Before BigFix, he had his own consulting firm which included Salesforce.com and several other pre-IPO companies as his clients. David also held senior marketing positions at Autonomy, Informix, Oracle, and Borland.
